1.content: Analyze Wispr Flow app features and functionality
1.details: Extract content from https://wisprflow.ai/ to understand current features, user interface, pricing, and value proposition

2.content: Research competitive landscape and enhancement opportunities
2.details: Research similar voice-to-text apps, identify gaps, and determine areas for improvement and additional features

3.content: Design superior app architecture and feature set
3.details: Create comprehensive feature list with improvements, design cross-platform architecture, plan 100+ language support, and develop lightweight reliability strategy

4.details: Build the app using Electron or Tauri for Mac/Windows/Linux support, implement voice recognition, text processing, multi-language support, and enhanced features
